name: Magical Andaman

itinerary.desc: On arrival at Port Blair Airport by flight, you will be received and transferred to your hotel. In the afternoon start a tour of places in and around Port Blair - covering the Corbyn's Cove Beach & Cellular Jail. In the evening attend the enthralling Sound and Light Show at Cellular Jail, where the heroic saga of the Indian freedom struggle is brought alive. Overnight stay at Hotel.
itinerary.note: The Museum is Open all 7 days except Public Holidays. If your trip falls on a public holiday, we will cover Museum and Sound & Light Show on the alternative days

locations: Port Blair SS- (Rose & North Bay Island)
itinerary.desc: After Breakfast visit the first Administrative settlement of the Britishers in the Andaman Islands, Ross Island. Earlier, said as the Paris of the past. This island today has ruins of all the luxury the Britishers had during that time. Visit this amazing destination and move forward on a boat to visit the Coral Island of Port Blair, North Bay Island. Infringe with rich marine life this island is the other most visited destination in Andaman. Scuba Diving, Sea Walk, Snorkeling and Glass boat ride can be done here. Return back to Hotel from these famous destinations rest and relax. Overnight stay at hotel.(Rose Island will be closed on Wednesdays)

Depart to Havelock Island. The destination is rated as the best island in India. Depart from Port Blair to Havelock Island in a ferry. Upon reaching Havelock will transfer you at your hotel. Later we begin our journey to one among Asia's best beach, Radhanagar Beach. Explore this white sand beach and bask in the beauty of this natural wonder. Post this we drop you back to your hotel and Overnight stay

We begin our journey to the most visited snorkelling destination in Havelock Island, Elephant Beach. Around 30 Minutes by boat, Elephant Beach flaunts one among the best reefs in Havelock Island. Upon reaching Elephant beach takes you to snorkel underwater where you explore the amazing reef in Elephant beach. Later we return back from Elephant beach to the Havelock dock in a boat. On Arrival drop you back to your hotel.

Check out from the hotel and board a ferry to Neil Island, upon reaching the island transfer to your respective Hotel. Later Visit Bharatpur beach and also visit to Howrah Bridge. Try to get a glimpse of sunset point at Sitapur beach. Over-night stay at Hotel.
After Breakfast, We return back from Neil Island to Port Blair by ferry. Upon reaching Port Blair transfer to Hotel. Rest and relax and later go for Shopping. Back to Hotel and overnight stay.
Transfer to Airport. Back to home with sweet memories of your tour.

name: Beautiful Bali

itinerary.desc: Welcome to Bali!!! On arrival proceed to immigrationformalities. Later, meet & greet our local representative Tour manager. Late, sit back in the comfort of your coach as we drive you to hotel. Afternoon Check into Hotel. In evening, we will enjoy Sunset Bali Cruise. There’s no betterway to spend a tropical evening in Bali than on Sunset Dinner Cruise. Watch the colours of the sky change from just a hint of a colour to shades of deeper orange, purple and red while you cruise along the harbour sipping a drink on the open-air top deck of the Cruise. Enjoy the sunset usually only seen in beautiful pictures. This time it is you making the magnificent photographs and memories that will last a lifetime. As you take in the cool night air on the top deck you will be entertained by our live musical entertainers. This is followed by a delicious international buffet dinner. Enjoy our live cabaret show and disco time.Overnight, stay at Hotel.

locations: Ubud Village Tour with Monkey Forest
itinerary.desc: After an American Breakfast at Hotel, proceed for a full day excursion to the Kintamani volcano. This trip will take you up close & personal with the essence of Bali. It is the most favourite tour of any first time visitor to Bali. Visit the Ubud Art, a one stop centre famous for traditional batik, hand weavings, wood carvings, paintings & handicrafts.Legong batik, then past the Celuk village famous for silver and gold works UC silver & Mas village Rai Shop. After having a fascinating visit the village, experience Breathe in the fresh air as you enter Ubud Monkey Forest, full of banyan trees, flowing streams, and ancient Hindu temples. Admire the natural beauty around and spend some time watching the playful grey macaques. You can also visit the Research centre to learn more about the monkeys and some 115 species of trees here. Continue your tour to the mount & Lake Batur view in Kintamani village for some stunning views of the beautiful locales in this region. And continue visit coffee plantation for watching how to making Santi Agrowisata. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at Hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we visit Tanjung Benoa Beach where you can enjoy your time at your own and even you will get to do Adventure Beach activities like Parasailing, Banana Boat and Jet Ski. Have a great experience at Beach. Day is free for leisure. In evening, heading to Tanah Lot Temple, Tanah Lot is a rock formation off the Indonesian island of Bali. It is home to the ancient Hindu pilgrimage temple Pura Tanah Lot, a popular tourist and cultural icon for photography. Enjoy Dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we will visit Nusa Penida - the beautiful island with white sand beaches. Climb aboard a fast boat at Sanur Beach and cross the sea to Toyapakeh on the small island of Nusa Penida. Visit the famous Kelingking Beach for the chance to take photos of the most beautiful spot on the island. Marvel at the cliffs overlooking the Indian Ocean, and then continue to Pasih Uug (Broken Beach) and the natural pool of Angel's Billabong. Experience the peace and quiet of one of the less visited spots on Nusa Penida before going to the popular beach at Crystal Bay, known for its great diving and snorkeling opportunities. Enjoy Dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

locations: Ubud (By Road - Kuta – Ubud // Approx.01 Hrs. // Approx. 35 KM.)
itinerary.desc: After an American Breakfast, Check out from Hotel. Today we will experience Ayung River Rafting - is the most challenging white water rafting sites in Bali, which has a stable water condition all year around. Apart from the rafting route, the panorama of this beautiful, intact natural area is highlighted by the appearance of wild animals. So, get ready to experience like never before forwho would like adventure and rafting in the medium level rapids. Ayung river rafting is 4 hours’ expedition  that takes you through the most adventurous rafting experience with the gorgeous scenic beauty around. It allows you to explore the lush green rainforest, spectacular waterfalls, and aweinspiring gorges. Rest of the day is free for leisure & own activity. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at Hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we will go to take another breath-taking experience by visit Bali Swing. Get thrilling feelings, adrenaline rush, unforgettable experiences and unique pictures. Imagine swinging and gliding on various spots over lush green forests, rice fields, river valley, awesome cliff view and much more. Afterwards, you will take you for Balinese Spa – the art of massage isn’t simply a quick escape from the day’s stress; it’s a ritual that returns your mental and physical self to a place of balance and calm. Rest of the day is free for leisure & own activity. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, Check Out And DAY Transfer to Airport for Your Flight Back Home. Good Times Need Never End! Relive The High Points of Your Tour. We Are Confident You Will Join Us Again Sometime Soon.

name: Kashmir Package

itinerary.desc: Welcome to Bali!!! On arrival proceed to immigrationformalities. Later, meet & greet our local representative Tour manager. There’s no betterway to spend a tropical evening in Bali than on Sunset Dinner Cruise. Watch the colours of the sky change from just a hint of a colour to shades of deeper orange, purple and red while you cruise along the harbour sipping a drink on the open-air top deck of the Cruise. Enjoy the sunset usually only seen in beautiful pictures. This time it is you making the magnificent photographs and memories that will last a lifetime. As you take in the cool night air on the top deck you will be entertained by our live musical entertainers. This is followed by a delicious international buffet dinner. Enjoy our live cabaret show and disco time.Overnight, stay at Hotel.

locations: Ubud Village Tour with Monkey Forest
itinerary.desc: After an American Breakfast at Hotel, proceed for a full day excursion to the Kintamani volcano. This trip will take you up close & personal with the essence of Bali. It is the most favourite tour of any first time visitor to Bali. Visit the Ubud Art, a one stop centre famous for traditional batik, hand weavings, wood carvings, paintings & handicrafts.Legong batik, then past the Celuk village famous for silver and gold works UC silver & Mas village Rai Shop. After having a fascinating visit the village, experience Breathe in the fresh air as you enter Ubud Monkey Forest, full of banyan trees, flowing streams, and ancient Hindu temples. Admire the natural beauty around and spend some time watching the playful grey macaques. You can also visit the Research centre to learn more about the monkeys and some 115 species of trees here. Continue your tour to the mount & Lake Batur view in Kintamani village for some stunning views of the beautiful locales in this region. And continue visit coffee plantation for watching how to making Santi Agrowisata. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at Hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we visit Tanjung Benoa Beach where you can enjoy your time at your own and even you will get to do Adventure Beach activities like Parasailing, Banana Boat and Jet Ski. Have a great experience at Beach. Day is free for leisure. In evening, heading to Tanah Lot Temple, Tanah Lot is a rock formation off the Indonesian island of Bali. It is home to the ancient Hindu pilgrimage temple Pura Tanah Lot, a popular tourist and cultural icon for photography. Enjoy Dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we will visit Nusa Penida - the beautiful island with white sand beaches. Climb aboard a fast boat at Sanur Beach and cross the sea to Toyapakeh on the small island of Nusa Penida. Visit the famous Kelingking Beach for the chance to take photos of the most beautiful spot on the island. Marvel at the cliffs overlooking the Indian Ocean, and then continue to Pasih Uug (Broken Beach) and the natural pool of Angel's Billabong. Experience the peace and quiet of one of the less visited spots on Nusa Penida before going to the popular beach at Crystal Bay, known for its great diving and snorkeling opportunities. Enjoy Dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

locations: Ubud (By Road - Kuta – Ubud // Approx.01 Hrs. // Approx. 35 KM.)
itinerary.desc: After an American Breakfast, Check out from Hotel. Today we will experience Ayung River Rafting - is the most challenging white water rafting sites in Bali, which has a stable water condition all year around. Apart from the rafting route, the panorama of this beautiful, intact natural area is highlighted by the appearance of wild animals. So, get ready to experience like never before forwho would like adventure and rafting in the medium level rapids. Ayung river rafting is 4 hours’ expedition  that takes you through the most adventurous rafting experience with the gorgeous scenic beauty around. It allows you to explore the lush green rainforest, spectacular waterfalls, and aweinspiring gorges. Rest of the day is free for leisure & own activity. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at Hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we will go to take another breath-taking experience by visit Bali Swing. Get thrilling feelings, adrenaline rush, unforgettable experiences and unique pictures. Imagine swinging and gliding on various spots over lush green forests, rice fields, river valley, awesome cliff view and much more. Afterwards, you will take you for Balinese Spa – the art of massage isn’t simply a quick escape from the day’s stress; it’s a ritual that returns your mental and physical self to a place of balance and calm. Rest of the day is free for leisure & own activity. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, Check Out And DAY Transfer to Airport for Your Flight Back Home. Good Times Need Never End! Relive The High Points of Your Tour. We Are Confident You Will Join Us Again Sometime Soon.

name: Sikkim

itinerary.desc: Welcome to Bali!!! On arrival proceed to immigrationformalities. Later, meet & greet our local representative Tour manager. Late, sit back in the comfort of your coach as we drive you to hotel. Afternoon Check into Hotel. In evening, we will enjoy Sunset Bali Cruise. There’s no betterway to spend a tropical evening in Bali than on Sunset Dinner Cruise. Watch the colours of the sky change from just a hint of a colour to shades of deeper orange, purple and red while you cruise along the harbour sipping a drink on the open-air top deck of the Cruise. Enjoy the sunset usually only seen in beautiful pictures. This time it is you making the magnificent photographs and memories that will last a lifetime. As you take in the cool night air on the top deck you will be entertained by our live musical entertainers. This is followed by a delicious international buffet dinner. Enjoy our live cabaret show and disco time.Overnight, stay at Hotel.

locations: Ubud Village Tour with Monkey Forest
itinerary.desc: After an American Breakfast at Hotel, proceed for a full day excursion to the Kintamani volcano. This trip will take you up close & personal with the essence of Bali. It is the most favourite tour of any first time visitor to Bali. Visit the Ubud Art, a one stop centre famous for traditional batik, hand weavings, wood carvings, paintings & handicrafts.Legong batik, then past the Celuk village famous for silver and gold works UC silver & Mas village Rai Shop. After having a fascinating visit the village, experience Breathe in the fresh air as you enter Ubud Monkey Forest, full of banyan trees, flowing streams, and ancient Hindu temples. Admire the natural beauty around and spend some time watching the playful grey macaques. You can also visit the Research centre to learn more about the monkeys and some 115 species of trees here. Continue your tour to the mount & Lake Batur view in Kintamani village for some stunning views of the beautiful locales in this region. And continue visit coffee plantation for watching how to making Santi Agrowisata. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at Hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we visit Tanjung Benoa Beach where you can enjoy your time at your own and even you will get to do Adventure Beach activities like Parasailing, Banana Boat and Jet Ski. Have a great experience at Beach. Day is free for leisure. In evening, heading to Tanah Lot Temple, Tanah Lot is a rock formation off the Indonesian island of Bali. It is home to the ancient Hindu pilgrimage temple Pura Tanah Lot, a popular tourist and cultural icon for photography. Enjoy Dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we will visit Nusa Penida - the beautiful island with white sand beaches. Climb aboard a fast boat at Sanur Beach and cross the sea to Toyapakeh on the small island of Nusa Penida. Visit the famous Kelingking Beach for the chance to take photos of the most beautiful spot on the island. Marvel at the cliffs overlooking the Indian Ocean, and then continue to Pasih Uug (Broken Beach) and the natural pool of Angel's Billabong. Experience the peace and quiet of one of the less visited spots on Nusa Penida before going to the popular beach at Crystal Bay, known for its great diving and snorkeling opportunities. Enjoy Dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

locations: Ubud (By Road - Kuta – Ubud // Approx.01 Hrs. // Approx. 35 KM.)
itinerary.desc: After an American Breakfast, Check out from Hotel. Today we will experience Ayung River Rafting - is the most challenging white water rafting sites in Bali, which has a stable water condition all year around. Apart from the rafting route, the panorama of this beautiful, intact natural area is highlighted by the appearance of wild animals. So, get ready to experience like never before forwho would like adventure and rafting in the medium level rapids. Ayung river rafting is 4 hours’ expedition  that takes you through the most adventurous rafting experience with the gorgeous scenic beauty around. It allows you to explore the lush green rainforest, spectacular waterfalls, and aweinspiring gorges. Rest of the day is free for leisure & own activity. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at Hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we will go to take another breath-taking experience by visit Bali Swing. Get thrilling feelings, adrenaline rush, unforgettable experiences and unique pictures. Imagine swinging and gliding on various spots over lush green forests, rice fields, river valley, awesome cliff view and much more. Afterwards, you will take you for Balinese Spa – the art of massage isn’t simply a quick escape from the day’s stress; it’s a ritual that returns your mental and physical self to a place of balance and calm. Rest of the day is free for leisure & own activity. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, Check Out And DAY Transfer to Airport for Your Flight Back Home. Good Times Need Never End! Relive The High Points of Your Tour. We Are Confident You Will Join Us Again Sometime Soon.

itinerary.desc: After an American Breakfast, Check out from Hotel. Today we will experience Ayung River Rafting - is the most challenging white water rafting sites in Bali, which has a stable water condition all year around. Apart from the rafting route, the panorama of this beautiful, intact natural area is highlighted by the appearance of wild animals. So, get ready to experience like never before forwho would like adventure and rafting in the medium level rapids. Ayung river rafting is 4 hours’ expedition  that takes you through the most adventurous rafting experience with the gorgeous scenic beauty around. It allows you to explore the lush green rainforest, spectacular waterfalls, and aweinspiring gorges. Rest of the day is free for leisure & own activity. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at Hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we will go to take another breath-taking experience by visit Bali Swing. Get thrilling feelings, adrenaline rush, unforgettable experiences and unique pictures. Imagine swinging and gliding on various spots over lush green forests, rice fields, river valley, awesome cliff view and much more. Afterwards, you will take you for Balinese Spa – the art of massage isn’t simply a quick escape from the day’s stress; it’s a ritual that returns your mental and physical self to a place of balance and calm. Rest of the day is free for leisure & own activity. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

name: Honeymoon

itinerary.desc: Welcome to Bali!!! On arrival proceed to immigrationformalities. Later, meet & greet our local representative Tour manager. Late, sit back in the comfort of your coach as we drive you to hotel. Afternoon Check into Hotel. In evening, we will enjoy Sunset Bali Cruise. There’s no betterway to spend a tropical evening in Bali than on Sunset Dinner Cruise. Watch the colours of the sky change from just a hint of a colour to shades of deeper orange, purple and red while you cruise along the harbour sipping a drink on the open-air top deck of the Cruise. Enjoy the sunset usually only seen in beautiful pictures. This time it is you making the magnificent photographs and memories that will last a lifetime. As you take in the cool night air on the top deck you will be entertained by our live musical entertainers. This is followed by a delicious international buffet dinner. Enjoy our live cabaret show and disco time.Overnight, stay at Hotel.

locations: Ubud Village Tour with Monkey Forest
itinerary.desc: After an American Breakfast at Hotel, proceed for a full day excursion to the Kintamani volcano. This trip will take you up close & personal with the essence of Bali. It is the most favourite tour of any first time visitor to Bali. Visit the Ubud Art, a one stop centre famous for traditional batik, hand weavings, wood carvings, paintings & handicrafts.Legong batik, then past the Celuk village famous for silver and gold works UC silver & Mas village Rai Shop. After having a fascinating visit the village, experience Breathe in the fresh air as you enter Ubud Monkey Forest, full of banyan trees, flowing streams, and ancient Hindu temples. Admire the natural beauty around and spend some time watching the playful grey macaques. You can also visit the Research centre to learn more about the monkeys and some 115 species of trees here. Continue your tour to the mount & Lake Batur view in Kintamani village for some stunning views of the beautiful locales in this region. And continue visit coffee plantation for watching how to making Santi Agrowisata. In evening, enjoy dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at Hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we visit Tanjung Benoa Beach where you can enjoy your time at your own and even you will get to do Adventure Beach activities like Parasailing, Banana Boat and Jet Ski. Have a great experience at Beach. Day is free for leisure. In evening, heading to Tanah Lot Temple, Tanah Lot is a rock formation off the Indonesian island of Bali. It is home to the ancient Hindu pilgrimage temple Pura Tanah Lot, a popular tourist and cultural icon for photography. Enjoy Dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.

After an American Breakfast at Hotel, today we will visit Nusa Penida - the beautiful island with white sand beaches. Climb aboard a fast boat at Sanur Beach and cross the sea to Toyapakeh on the small island of Nusa Penida. Visit the famous Kelingking Beach for the chance to take photos of the most beautiful spot on the island. Marvel at the cliffs overlooking the Indian Ocean, and then continue to Pasih Uug (Broken Beach) and the natural pool of Angel's Billabong. Experience the peace and quiet of one of the less visited spots on Nusa Penida before going to the popular beach at Crystal Bay, known for its great diving and snorkeling opportunities. Enjoy Dinner at Indian Restaurant. Overnight, stay at hotel.
